review_text: A classic small town bar. This bar has a traditional and fun atmosphere. The beer cans on the walls are neat. But it is very smoky, it is obvious people still smoke in this bar. Overall a classic small town bar.

Another small town hyped Cafe by the locals.  Nice prompt service happy staff it was busy.  No single seating tables are 3 seats to 8.  I went for breakfast got a Works Ommlet 7.95 and a flat rubbery waffle 3.95 and coffee 1.75  Ommlet had fresh ingredients hashbowns were good. Eggs were little watery and the wheat toast was fair. The waffle was a rubbery hockey puck texture like a bagel. Syrup never saturated and had to use a knife to eat it. Waffles should be fluffy and easy to take bites of. ...
For someone who is picky about fish frys, I loved it here. Everything got high marks to include service, price and staff.
Great food selection. Reasonable price. Great service.
Lockwood's is still open. It never closed and the food is great. The drinks are great and the service is awesome. Best fish fry in Dane County
The Bomb!!. Where else can you get fish fry AND Pizza! (where else can you get a large pepperoni pizza for $7.95?) HERE

We noticed there were black greasy specs on all of our glasses after we ate our food.  We went up to ask the staff about it and one woman said that they knew about the problem.  It is on all the serving ware put into the dishwasher.  They got a new dishwasher and everything now has black, greasy, specs on it.  They said they were told that the chemicals in the dishwasher are eating the rubber hoses and leaving the specs.  They said they tried different things to remediate the problem but were to...
Best Burgers in Dane and Green counties! Unreal cheap. Nice little older lady owner. Enjoy!
They have some of the best burgers I've ever had!
Very good burgers good beer and very inexpensive. Brandon the manager Cooking good burger
Tasty pizza & maybe the best old fashioneds I've had around Madison. Will go back!

Madcity Marty. Here we go again, like Eagle Crest, BBB (Big Boring Bland) Burgers, Even gave her a jar of Andy Roo's BBQ Grill Seasoning to give anything she puts on the grill LIFE! But to no avail, it sits under the counter for years. Afraid of Flavor! Had a Gyro last night and was reminded of it round 2AM. Hate to say it but, GREAT PEANUTS yet typical bar food that has gone down hill over the years...
Great food!. Friday fish is excellent, ribs are excellent, prime rib is awesome! Pizza is average

LIke (barely) - not for everyone. Did give this restaurant a "like." That said, it's not what I would call great food; more like "comfort food." Clearly this is generally a regular's type place, I would say nearly everyone in the place knew everyone else.  The options were lots of basic "like Mom used to make" dishes. I say it's not for everyone because you've got to be in the mood for "greasy spoon" type food (and I don't mean that in a bad way). As indicated, I can't say the food impressed m...

Outstanding Service and great food. Clean and friendly staff. It is rare to find a good working owner who cares this one does. Your every need is meet and everyone is friendly. Great pizza and a great selection of Ice Cream. A+ rating from me.

Great place. All the food is good. Made from scratch pizza. Best in town. Wonderful owners and staff. Super for Badger sports, Brewers, Packers, NASCAR. Don't miss this place. They and their customers will always make you feel welcome.
No HI when we came in and then returned without aervice - then when we had a loud member yell across without saying quiet. It is a bar not a restaurant- and it would have been fine but it is 8 PM
Best pancakes in town
Great breakfast, great service, and great prices!

I have gone to Appletree Family Restaurant for many years, but have become disheartened with them over the last several months. The waitressess are not very friendly - except if you are a 65 year old white male who sits at the counter. I stopped in yesterday to pick up breakfast to go and the waitress didn't even say hi or good morning or look at me when I came in or left. Just told me how much I owe. I now go to Columbus Family Restaurant instead. They are friendly and have taken the time to kn...
Nice Family Restaurant. I have never had a problem eating here. There food is never disappointing and it is family friendly.
Service is slow.

Excellent bar. The older gentleman, probably the owner, that tended bar the night we dined at the Capri makes an exceptional brandy old fashion sweet. The food at the Capri is pretty typical for a WI supper club - relish tray, cheese and crackers, a basket of warm rolls, great homemade soup (a bit salty though), iceburg lettuce salad (homemade salad dressings) and a variety of entrees. I had the rib eye steak which was tasty but not cooked correctly. It looked kind of grey - light grill marks - ...

Fabulous deal!. Always really liked the Capri... Unless you're a "chain" type person you probably will too! And... now they've found a way to entice us in amidst the busy work week! Sunday - Thursday is buy one get one (except lobster)!!! Fabulous!!! The ribs, salmon, pork chops... Mmmmmmmmm! And what a deal!? The Friday night fish is pretty delish too!!!

Great food and great old fashioned atmosphere. Had our first dinner at Capri last night and it was wonderful. The petite filet was done to perfection. The baked potato is served with sour cream infused with chives, which was yummy. The soup and salad were also very good. (You get soup AND salad with an entree - not either/or!) They also serve a vegetable of the day with the entree, and a relish tray and rolls. So you get a LOT of food, making it an excellent value. Our server was pleasant and ve...

Not the greatest. I've only eaten there once but wouldn't go back again. Given the quantity of the food (at least when you factor in the relish tray, salad, and rolls that come before the main course), I can see why they charge so much for their dishes. But in terms of quality, it's rather disappointing. I had the chopped sirloin with au jus and toast. The meat was literally a dried and steaming brick of ground beef. I was with three friends, and we all had something different, but the general c...
Eh, it's hard to go wrong with Chinese, so it wasn't terrible. Had the sesame chicken and sweet'n'sour pork. Both were just kind of bland.

Excellent food and service. This restaurant always has quality food and service every time we go. Our family love it and so do the guests we take on occasion. The prices are reasonable and the portions good sized. The family that runs the place is awesome and the staff is always friendly.
Good location, price, Good Food. Soup is a must have.
Great family diner! Don't expect gourmet, but this is a great little diner, and you can't beat the price!

I love the food there. Their Friday fish fry is wonderful, and they have the best chicken dumpling soup! The owner is such a great down to earth guy too. He always checks on us to make sure w are happy! (fernando)
This is the restaurant to go to if you want great food, wonderful service and all at terrific price.

Most all meals are very high calorie. The single butter burger is one of the lowest in calories.  -----10 Jul, 2011----- Food is basic but, good. Fast service and courteous staff. Regular ice cream specials.
SO good! Fast delivery and reasonably priced :)
Stick to frozen pizza. Save your money and time. Should be called final day pizza
Coffee was fresh and tasty. Staff were kind and helpful. Tried the Haywire cookie. Chocolate and peanut butter and about as big as my head. Delicious.
Friendly service. Great coffee and sandwiches!
I think it is the most wonderful place I ever ate at I love there 3 cheese and veggie burger!!!!!!
Love it!
This is a great place for burgers, fries, and ice cream. This drive in place is outdoors only and is open from Memorial Day to Labor Day.
Good subs and fast service.  -----26 Mar, 2011----- Good service.

A family restaurant with a family feel. Never have I found a bar and restaurant who will make you feel like family, and not be worried to take real friends and family there.  The menu is vast, with specials every day and night, and especially on weekend. The pricing is VERY reasonable also.  There are countless activities to enjoy in the winter, all the regular bar things you could think of, except shuffleboard. And in the summer you can add volleyball and horseshoes to the mix.  Try it a ...

A treasure!. The black bear has wonderful food and is a comfortable place to go. The staff is very hard working. I was so disturbed today when I heard about a review someone wrote that was beyond their opinion of service but went on to insult the appearance as well as other things with the bartenders there. The unhappy patron referred to a recent packer game at which it seems he wasn't able to get his drunk on in a fast enough manner when the bar was extremely busy and the bartenders were doing ...

Madcity Marty. I've known the owner Domanic since oh 93ish, good guy, nice boat, but the food is unfortunetly marginal again, the fish fry didn't make it. Again feeling they have to be boring and are afraid of flavor. Great local, but not good food...

NO SERVICE. Went there Sunday Sept 15 2012 with my 2 adult kids. Upon arrival the waitress told us we could sit  anywhere we wanted we sat in the area near the pool table. There was a group seated near us.  We waited and waited no one ever brought us menus. The table next to us never had no interaction  from the waitstaff. It was however interesting to observe the patrons at the bar be so very well serviced.  Truly those customers were the priorty! After 15 minutes we got up to leave.. Befor...

So much potential..... I like their breakfast and salad bar. I agree that some of the bartenders could be a lot better, but some are very nice and attentive. It's a gamble.....ya never know what you'll get when you visit. I have been in there in the past and the bartenders seem bothered when we'd ask to do the shake or for a menu. Tvs could be a lot better. They definitely have the space to update the tvs. Do it!
They never mess up an order and are fast. The workers are friendly too. Best Micky D's I know of.
I love this place. The pizza is not overly greasy and probably one of my favorites in the Madison area. Their new pickup window is convenient. They have pretty good subs and pasta as well.
"Good Stuff". We love this pizza! Great taste, great service. You can order the pizza "extra crispy" and they will cook it a few minutes longer, that's the way I like it. We are regulars for life.

Horrible! Don't Waste Your Time!. Whoever took ownership of the Subway Franchise in Cottage Grove, WI lacks customer vision. I use to enjoy frequenting the restaurant multiple times a week. Since the ownership change I rarely go, and every time I go back I am proven to myself it was a mistake. I would love to provide you with a receipt however I am never provided with one from the restaurant, they are always out of receipt paper. “Corporate is not providing receipt paper anymore”. Since the ...
Slow. This isn't fast food. Its super slow and they run out of food all the time! Don't eat here, its a waste.

FANTASTIC Place to Dine. Mr. Grassman's review below is nothing but hearsay and should be ignored. He was NOT at the Cafe on the day in question. There were only two customers there at the time of the incident, and I was one of them! The disabled person and his caretaker were handled in a very considerate and responsible manner by the Cafe personnel. Moreover, they were not asked to leave; they chose to leave even when the Cafe owner responded "no" that is not necessary. In the end, customers ar...

Love the Village Cafe. My husband and I have gone to the Village Café almost daily since the new owners bought it 7 or 8 years ago. We love the small town atmosphere, camaraderie with staff and customers and, of course, the food. We have never seen the owner or staff be anything but friendly to customers. We love it!!

Terrible treatment. Hugely discriminatory to a very disabled young man and his mother!  Lady, you do not deserve to own a restaurant after being confronted about your previous behavior and seeing nothing wrong in your discrimination.  But, you won;t have to worry about managing/owning a restaurant much longer. After the ADA has gone through the evidence and the witnessed comments you made, you'll be looking for another job. GOOD LUCK, it tough out there for unemployed waitresses.
This Place Sucks!!!. Horrible Horrible services will never ever go too this nasty place..owners are horrible people with no respect too their customers. .You should be shut down!!

We were visiting town and wanted to grab a tasty lunch without paying an arm and a leg. The staff is super friendly and efficient. The soup is the best soup ever. I had the Cheesy Potato. It was hearty and delicious. Great choice for a cold or rainy day. My nephew had the Chicken Strips and fries. He loved it! My mom had the Crispy Spicy Chicken Wrap which comes with a bowl of soup and fries. She was not disappointed!  The wrap was huge. The Village Cafe is cozy and inviting and very reasonably ...
Madcity Marty. It's more prideless crap off the Asian Foods Truck.   Probebly give ya the Shi_ _, well better make it home quick shall I say.
OMG YUM. I ordered 95$ worth of food and they were super amazing. The best experience ever. Anytime I get Chinese food I always come here. My food was delicious and I thank them so much!

Stanard Culver's fare. Good Culver's fare - this Culver's location offers a loyalty program to customers which is a nice addition. Sometimes service is a bit slow but the food is fresh and service is always with a smile.

Everytime we go to culver's it's wonderful customer service!!! Always so friendly and polite!! Accuracy of orders is always spot on and that is a big deal!!! Clean inside and out, I highly recommend!!
Culver's is the best -friendly staff and awesome food.  No mystery meat in their sandwiches!  And the best fries around.  And who can't love the frozen custard for desert?! :)

I love treating myself to Culver's.  The Pub Burgers are my favorites and a smoothie to go with it!  My daughter and I will go inside and eat and catch up for an hour or more because its such a nice place to be.

We eat at this Culvers each week when we come to town. The food is always prepared well and the orders are correct. We also like seeing the same people each week and the service is very fast. We enjoy this location and their food very much. The absolute best cheeseburgers anywhere.
Fast and Good. Try the sesame chicken. Awesome!
Not much in atmosphere but the food was great. Had the sesame chicken combo and it was wonderful and plenty of it. The prices are  more than fair and definitely will go back.
Best burgers around. Great menu they even have rabbit burgers! Cheap drinks and drink specials nightly.Homeade desserts and soup during lunch

Great bar food. This is one of the best little town bar spots for great food. Everything we have tried has been fantastic. Its a wait to get a table if you go early on Friday. The fish dinner is fantastic and you get a ton of food for the price. So far, we have never had a bad meal. Highly recommend if your passing through or live nearby. I cant believed we lived in town for 5 years before trying this place.
I find this place kind of hit or miss. Def a long wait for fish on Friday. People don't seem very friendly. May try it again.

Really Good Grub!. This joint has the best cheeseburgers around. I don't know how they do it and I don't care. They are seriously awesome. I also love the steak fries. I do recommend asking them to burn the heck out of them so they're crispy and lovely. I've never had it but the reuben is stellar. I know people who order it whether they're hungry or not . .. oh yeah . .. they have cocktails too!
Excellent Pizza. I absolutely loved the chicken bacon ranch, great crust and plenty of toppings. They deliver so it was awesome.

I've tried this 3 or 4 times. Pizza was okay- like domino's pretty much, or little cesars. I thought the people were super nice and seemed to be working hard (I picked up my za, but I know they do some delivery). Will prob get it again.

Some improvement noted. Okay, so we tried this place again - twice. It has improved since my first review. In my opinion it is now on par with Domino's or Little Caesar's. Still not a favorite.  -----29 Jul, 2009----- Not really pizza. This pizza tastes more like grease on cardboard. Granted it has been a while since I have tried it. Twice was enough for me. I would prefer frozen pizza.

Terrible. I was there for a pick-up the day before with banana peppers requested on my pizza, and all I received were the left-over slices of thick b.p. and no rings. Today, I decided it was a fluke, because I use to work in a pizza place for OVER 5 yrs and understand mistakes. Ordered their buffalo chicken sub with no mushrooms and bacon added. Neither requests were handled. Mushrooms all over the sub(I've never had a mushroom in my life) and paid for bacon(sweet-tooth for bacon). VERY upset wi...

Unprofessional...employees don't seem like they even want to help you. Then on top of that, can't do simple math. I got the wrong change 3 times before I flat out told them how much change I should get! $20.18 - $9.18 doesn't equal $7.10...or $12.00...or $9.36...it freakin equals $11!

I love this bar. Bar is awesome everyone is so nice, very inviting, and friendly. We met a wonderful older couple that sits at the end of the bar, there everyday, named Joe and Marlene. Joe likes to drink warm Miller Genuine draft from a can, which the bar has out just for him, that's cool. If you go expect great conversations and well made bar food. Cant wait to go back. Dave and Ann

Decent. If you really like Chinese food, give this place a try once in a while. I think Sizzling Hut overall is better, but I actually prefer some of Chang Jiang's dishes to the Hut's (not that theirs are bad). Chang Jiang's sesame chicken packed a punch.
The custard is always amazing!

Food is good, prices are not.. Typical family restaurant. Huge menu options that make you wonder how fresh some of the stuff can be when you can order liver and onions or a meatloaf and neither are a nightly special.   I have stayed with the safe stuff and the food has been good. Prices are way out of whack. Breakfast of 2 eggs, one meat, toast, hashbrowns, and a small milk will run you just shy of $10.   Plenty of seating and its clean.

Takeout. We ordered takeout for lunch and the food was not so great. It took awhile to place 7 meal orders over the phone and the food was just okay. I ordered Eggs Florentine and the spinach was soaked in butter that tasted odd. Another person ordered a vegetable omlet and the feta cheese was blocks of cheese on top of the omlet instead of crumbs. We also ordered the house omlet and there was a layer of oil under the omlet. We will not order from there again.

We got to the restaurant 20 min before they closed ams they were still very willing to seat us.  Service was prompt, and the food was hot and delicious.  I had the crispy chicken wrap with a Caesar dressing and hubby had the turkey club with French fries.  Both of our meals had hot bacon and his fries were hot.  We weren't rushed and we enjoyed a wonderful late supper.  Highly recommend this place for great food and great service.

Awful. HORRIBLE- will never return. I spent a whole season here playing volleyball, spent a generous amount of money there on a weekly basis. When we returned for a Friday night out, the owner (Yes the owner!) was behind the bar and charged us $18 for a beer- we tried kindly refuting the charge, kindly requesting to review the bar tabs in case there was a misunderstanding- she threw the pen at us and told us to bring cash next time. We are honest, respectful, upstanding neighbors, and were treat...

Best Bar in the area. Too bad this other person had an "awful" experience because we frequent the Sunset Grill weekly and we love it here. Lots of nice flat screen tv's to watch any sporting event and the food is awesome, including the best burgers in the area, maybe the county. I cant speak for anybody else but I highly recommend the Sunset Grill.
Best food in town!!! And great salads:) yummy! Will be Definately going for dinner!
Service. Have meat raffle which is spread very slow. Service poor. Food hit and miss.

The Sunset Grill is amazing. We played billiards and darts while waiting for our dinner, but it came so fast we hqd to play while eating!!!! The pulled pork sandwich and the philly steak sandwich are amazing!! Disregard the prrcentage above, amazing place!
Terrible service and rude people what do you expect from people in Defoe

I normally do not eat McDonald's or any fast food ever except breakfast on rare occasions.  I decided to give McDonald's a second chance since they started serving breakfast all day.  My boyfriend lives in De Forest and we went through the drive thru on Saturday night on 10-17-15. Whoever was working the drive thru window was incredibly unprofessional. He first told us about how some coworkers were trying to make him listen to a song on their phone that he hated before trying to take our order. ...

Bad Management. Omelet seemed bland, but I was okay with it, much better in Johnson Creek. Later, my friend found hair in her food and had lost her appetite after hardly eating anything. She had to be to work in under an hour and agreed to meet with me at the restaurant. The waitress offered us "another scoop", but that was it. I spoke to a manager and she said that we could order something else, but she wouldn't strike it from our receipt. My friend didn't have time to order and wait for anothe...

For late night...or breakfast. A great restaurant pretty much anytime you need some comfort food. Always have good service here, and they will accommodate pretty much any reasonable request. The other reviewer is right that it's hoppin' late at night, but it's a popular breakfast spot too, and for good reason.
Great! We had the Pot Roast and chicken dumpling soup in our group. Everything from sage dressing, mashed potatoes and rolls were homemade. Don't forget to save room for their fabulous desserts!!

Late Night Pine Cone Eclair Run. - -=Expected=- Late night urge satisfied for a huge éclair. -=What we got=- *A good carafe of coffee *A huge éclair (as big as a baby's head!) with thick fudgy frosting, YUM! *A friendly server, despite being the only one on shift! -=Disappointing=- It is a truck stop, so expect smokers (only for 1 more month). -=Surprising=- The place was packed at 11pm on a weekday. We didn't expect to get a seat but a booth quickly opened. Our server was super friendly...
The perfect pit stop. One word: ECLAIR

Best Chinese Food Around. We moved to DeForest and tried the Sizzling Hut for some Chinese food. We have come back several times. They have the best Chinese food around. Lots of food at reasonable prices and excellent tasting. The hostess is such a nice woman. If you like Chinese food, you should definitely try this restaurant.
Happened to just drive through town tonight. Delicious authentic Chinese food and super friendly staff. Gotta try the fried rice and grill chicken!
The hut that sizzles. Truly delicious Chinese food with high-quality ingredients and sauces. Excellent, fast service. The people who own this place are absolutely the kindest, sweetest people.

Very Good. We ordered lunch from the Sizzling Hut while staying in town for work and thought it was delicious! Some of the best Chinese takeout food I've had. I recommend the steamed broccoli lunch special, whatever sauce they put on it was amazing!
We have been eating here from the day it opened (both times:). The quality of food is as good as it gets. Lots of pride goes into every dish. Give them a try and you WILL be back.
Great bar food and reasonable prices for food and drinks. Double Bubble Tuesday and VIP Friday's make you keep coming back. A favorite local!
Don't go. Stop in for a cocktail put a twenty on the bar six twenty five in change, hope the bar tender enjoyed her tip. Won't be back there for a long time and you should not go also!!!!!!!
Horrible service! Rude employees! We waited longer than anyone else for our food. Never going there again! p.s re decorate!
Food was decent. Service was terrible. I waited forty minutes for a burger.

Good bar food. This busy place serves good bar type food. The burgers are tasty, the steaks average and there are daily specials. For a casual meal with an American menu this place is more the adequate. Service is attentive. This is a very casual spot attracting boaters in the summer and snow mobiler in the winter. Folks seem to know one another here and appear to have a lot of fun at the Anchor Inn.
Horrible service. 20 mins for curds and diet. wouldnt serve set up tables that were not in "current serving area". another 20 for another diet...
Tasty bar food at good prices. Nothing special to write home about but consistsnt food and service.

Good fast food. Culver's is the only fast food restaurant I will bring my little great niece to, and she loves it. Has her "own" booth and is always surprised if someone else is sitting there! The chicken tenders are really good as are the burgers and fries. The shredded beef is way too salty for me and the fish has too much breading. Overall, the food is fresh (hamburger is never frozen) and the service is quick. This Culver's is huge and very clean.

World's Largest. Billed as the world's largest Culver's, we had to stop here on our way down to Chicago. We wondered if it would be much larger than other Culver's, and we weren't disappointed in its size, which is considerably larger than other Culver's. It would be huge for any fast food restaurant, and comes complete with a meeting room, and a couple of different dining areas. This Culver's has a lot of bells and whistles, and if you're a fan of Culver's and find yourself in I-90 by Janesvill...

Bad food. We live in the area and have ordered food from the Dragon only twice. We thought we may have just gotten some bad food the first time so we tried it again. The food was just as bad the second time. Greasy food with fatty meat. The crab rangoon was horrid. We will not eat this food again!  UPDATE: My niece wanted to order food from the dragon as she likes it. So, we did. Spent about $30.00 on this inedible food. Still as bad as ever. The reviewer that said the crab rangoon was good - ...
Food is amazing but place isn't to clean still good tho
Good Food. Best Chinese food take-out in the area

Good food. Me and my whole family has been eat in dragon for a long time, they have a very nice food , and always have a smile face to customer. we like cabmeat rangoon, sesame chicken, and many manys more...we love dragon so much, we will be they customer forever.

Great Food Great Prices. Winchester restaurant has great food for a good price, its always fast and fresh. Homemade soups and subs. You can order to stay or to go. They are open 365/24/7 serving anyone and everyone. Waitstaff is friendly and outgoing.

Super average. Thought we'd try this place again after avoiding it for a decade. This is basically a truck stop with truck stop fare. The restaurant has been remodeled. The staff is attentive and friendly. The food however is still very average. The pancakes are actually awful - under cooked with a funky taste. Eggs were over cooked and the bacon was tasteless. The waitress told us the Friday fish fry and Saturday prime rib were fantastic. Not sure we'll be there to try them!
Awesome pulled pork under savory homemade BBQ sauce. My first choice for quick, delish and homemade lunch or supper.

Emigail's serves up some pretty good mexican food and the margarita's are authentic. Expensive for the area, but the food and drinks are good.  UPDATE: The place is going downhill and is rarely busy. Staff is indifferent, margaritas are no longer authentic. Now from a mix and the server was annoyed with my request for their authentic one. The last time we were there - and I do mean the LAST time - the place was nearly empty at 8:00 on a Saturday evening. The owner or manager was there - sullen...

Great food! My first choice for dining out in Edgerton. Fish fry is excellent & decently priced. Thursday night special is 1/2 rack BBQ ribs, fries & slaw for $10. The hickory smoked prime rib melts in your mouth. My favorite regular menu item is the gumbo; burgers are good too.
I had the jambalaya and a fat tire beer on tap. The food was good and so was the price.

Dinner At Lake House Inn. My family and I eat at lake house many times a year. We have chosen Lake House because of there great choices to choose from and there good service. It is a very cozy atmosphere and has a great staff always dressed professionally, kind and courteous. over the times we have been there i have chosen from the fried catfish, prime rib, flat iron steak, and they recently have added a chicken wing special which includes a variety of flavors and was served with loaded potato s...

Dinner at the Lake House Inn. Unless your a "local" and everyone knows you--dont expect to be greeted or seated (even with a reservation) without having to ask someone. We have been to the Lake House several times before with family who live in the area-so this was never an issue -- until Saturday. My husband and I decided we would go out for a nice dinner (without the local family joining us) and made reservations for 5:00. We got there at 4:59 and came into the bar and stood by the restaurant ...
Food was great and the service was awesome. Passing through town and picked a really good place for dinner.
It has been been over 10 years since my husband and I came here (and our expectation were high as we always loved it). We were not disappointed! Wonderful friendly staff and great fish fry!

So I see this is at a 100% rating, which makes me believe that I'm either picky or people really like dry steak around here. The steak was awful, no flavor and charred - which was ordered as medium rare, the baked potato wasn't fully cooked, the French onion soup was beef broth with provolone thr

Just okay. Mario's Pizza has been a popular place in Edgerton for many many years. The pizza is okay, nothing special. The other menu items however are not at all good. They seem to be frozen rather than freshly made although I don't know that for sure. They just don't have that home made Italian taste. Stick with the pizza - it is okay, not great!

Life time pizza fanatic. Marios has absolutely amazing pizza. Their thin crust is to die for. My dad and I both love pizza with the exception of that small place in Milton we both agree that Marios has amazing pizza. I've never had their menu items before though... It's decently priced too. If you're passing through Edgerton you should stop there for yourself and decide, just don't go to Paul Reveres unless you like cardboard.
Great burgers, free smelt. The burgers are great and they have free smelt sunday mornings.

Everything you want and more!. Ray's has the best food and biggest portions I have had in years. Their is a vast variety of food to chose from with great daily specials. I have been going to Ray's for years and would recommend this restaurant to everyone who is looking for a great bang for your buck!
Friendly environment, good food everytime, will be back again and again

Happy Eater. I have been to Rays Family Restaurant several times throughout the past few years and have never had a negative experience. The food always tastes amazing. I really enjoy the battered chicken strips but the salads are out of this world good!!!
Mmmmmmmmm. Friendly place, great food, favorite.

Great American food at really good prices. Breakfast is always good here and they make their own rhubarb strawberry jam which is heavenly. The atmosphere and prices reminds me of the Coffee Cup in Stoughton, but larger and even tastier food.

Beware - Edgerton WI. Typical subway food which I think is good. However, this owner does not accept national coupons and will not give you the $5.00 footlong price if you order anything different on one side - eg, no cheese on one half. You will be charged for 2 6" subs. I have complained to Subway headquarters to no avail. As a previous owner of 3 subways I am not happy that this owner is allowed to get away with this business practice.
I've driven past these for the past couple of years. But today I was in the mood for fast food Mex. I was pleasantly surprised. Beats the heck out of a Taco Bell.

Good breakfast. I've only eaten breakfast here on several occasions, but have not been disappointed. The pancakes are made from scratch and are excellent. The eggs are always very fresh and cooked perfectly to order. Bacon is good while sausage could be better, but isn't bad. Coffee is good as is the service. This is the best place for breakfast in Edgerton. The physical plant itself is old and dingy, but it is clean and that's what counts for me. Kind of an old hole in the wall with good food. ...
Greasy Spoon. Good for a dirty hangover breakfast, but otherwise, AVOID!

Really...... Employee on break sitting in booth has shoes sitting right where people walk to the counter to order. We said to her "Are these your shoes?" She replied "Yes" and left them right where they were. Talk about a lawsuit in the making!!!
Awesome..... The Nite Owl has great burgers, steak sandwiches and a great fish fry.  My only negative....forget their nachos.
Nice place. Good food and beer, pleasant atmosphere, great service. Kid-friendly without being kid focused. Wish I had a place like this near home.

Filthy employee, bland food. I was here for the Mother's Day brunch buffet with my family. I'm not sure how the regular dinners are, but this one wasn't great. Food was mostly bland/unseasoned, but edible. What horrified me was an employee behind the steamer table spooning food into the trays. His fingers were absolutely black, like he'd been working on an engine or digging in the dirt and hadn't bothered to wash up. Disgusting.

It's like going back to the 70s. But in a good way. I've only been to the Casino Supper Club once but plan on going back. It is far from fancy schmancy but the food is great the service is good and the price is right. The salad bar had everything on it you would expect and if I remember right (I went there a year ago) they had liver paste! Where do you see liver paste on a salad bar these days? My wife, son and I al had the prime rib and would recommend it.
Excellent, friendly service. Maddeningly diverse menu, but that's half the fun. Great last minute dinner stop.
Cool place. The coffee wasn't as good as Ancora or Alterra but the coffee shop was decorated really cool.

Cozy. On the outside, this looks like just another shopping-strip coffee bar; but inside, it's decorated warmly with old barn wood with tables & leather chairs around a big fireplace - a bit more character than most Starbucks. Food is really good; although prep can be a little slow when crowded. I've had coffee/breakfast, lunch & dinner here and never been disappointed.
Cut off serving alcohol at 9, open till 10. Went to buy a second beer at 9 and was told they could nt ring it up past 9. There was no last call either, very bummed.
Large craft beer selection and wine selection. Very large selection of wine and craft beer... Good deli sandwiches too.

Cool coofee shop with gud interiors and great ambience .  We had cappuccino and latte each 12 oz for 3.50$ The coffee was great both the lattee n cappuccino . Latee was having a slightly flavor of cinnamon in it I loved it. The best coffee ☕️ place after collectivo coffee . Everyone should visit this place for a coffee or a meal or some wine they offer everything n they are open till 10 and on Sunday till 8 pm .  Otherwise most of the coffee places are  closed till that time . Amd even they ...

Amazing food. We came in from out of town and took a chance that this place would be good. It was great. Large, private booths, friendly waiter, amazing food (and large portions) and reasonable prices made our night very special. This place would kick the Olive Garden in the .........!!!! Try it.

Horrible. Fish fry was freezer-burned-then-overcooked. Disgusting. Some fries were underdone, some overdone. The stuffed mushrooms were literally floating in butter and not seasoned. The pasta was also unseasoned and totally not worth it. It was awful. All the seafood is processed and from the freezer. To top it all off, after drinking a few sips of my chianti, I noticed the glass had a large crack in it that wrapped down and around the whole glass...seriously. The worst dining experience I thin...
Like it. Don't love it. Service is consistently good so I don't mind coming here. I just wish their food was spicier.

The food was amazing! The fresh baked bread was delicious dupe in the olive oil. I had the roasted garlic shrimp fettuccine and it was very rich and the shrimp were tender. Large selection of tap beers an wine menu.
Wonderful restaurant! The food is excellent and reasonably priced, and the staff is friendly and attentive.
Food quality is gone. Used to be great. Order is often wrong and the service is non-existent.
It's just another take out joint. Many better choices available. These are all over Madison now, and they can be best described as average.
one of the few options which offers delivery in area. Typical takeout menu. Kung pao chicken is flavorful. Be prepared to wait a little bit for delivery and food can be a tad greasy.

BEST Carry Out and Delivery in Madison. Curry in the Box is my favorite carry out option in Madison. I LOVE the Curry Squash and the Sweet Potato Curry. So delicious, especially if you order it HOT. And be sure to get some Roti. To top it off, they deliver.
Best in town!. Fast, fresh, flavorful dishes combined with friendly service. Never had a dish I didn't love!

I love their mixed veggie curry with tofu!. Curry in a Box staff was happy to substitute broccoli for potatoes, when ordering mixed veggie curry with tofu. I also was able to get tofu that was not previously deep fried. I love their brown rice. I order take out from this restaurant about 3 times per week, and really like it. Their staff is always helpful.

New location in Madison!. I discovered that Curry In The Box has a new location on University Avenue in Madison. I stopped in and ordered the Chicken Karee which was ready almost as soon as I sat down. It was fresh, hot, and delicious. I plan to go back frequently!
I frequent the University Ave location during lunch hours when I'm working. My favorite menu item is the house curry lunch special with an order of roti. The tofu in this dish is excellent.
Waste of money. Waited ten minutes for some nuked chicken and cold fries. Keeping it classy DQ

A Brew Pub. Being a home brewer I always try and visit establishments that craft their own beers and the Great Dane does not disappoint. Staff was welcoming and accommodating to our group. We were seated and addressed quickly where I ordered up an Old Glory American Pale Ale which I found very good. Ordered the German Sausage plate for dinner and just had to have the Dunkelweizen to round it out. Not only was the meal very good but the beer was on target for it's style. If your in the Madison ar...

A contender. I got here about 11am so it was def time for a bloody and bloody is was. One one the better bloodies in town. Nice and thick with just enough kick and a nice amount of greens to go with. I also decided to have a burger. I can't remember the name, but it came on a jalapeno bun with fresh cooked apple wood bacon and it even had a chipotle cream cheese in it. The burger itself was cooked to perfection and seasoned perfectly. The meat itself was not frozen and of good quality. I can't w...

Great Dane Hits on all 3. This past Saturday evening I made my way out to Fitchburg after having read some online reviews on Yelp.com and Urbanspoon.com and several of the hit items the Great Dane serves up. I even found some images on the net that really sold me on making a stop this past weekend to indulge myself in a classic burger that offered something different at the same time. Lets not forget that el fresco dining options never hurts either. At the Great Dane in Fitchburg, you get all th...
I have never had a bad meal here, or even an "ok" meal - every one has been wonderful.

Mmmm tasty food. Fast service on a Wednesday at 6pm. Had the pretzyl burger with a burger and a brat patty stacked on or some such wisco nonsense. It was good. Great scotch ale as well. 9/10 and would return.

It was okay. There wasn't a single vegetarian item on the menu - however with Mexican food it was easy for them to make me some veg-friendly tacos. They were good. I liked that they had a salsa bar too for free chips and salsa refills. It didn't necessarily wow me, but it was very reasonably priced so I can barely complain.

Delicious food and friendly staff! Make sure you look at the new menu, the 3 first images on the menu section are no longer the same.  I have uploaded a pic of the new menu for your convenience!  And do not forget to get a slice of 3 leches cake for dessert, its the best!              Also, the correct address is 3054 Fish Hatchery Rd. Fitchburg, WI 53713
Horrible Service. Like most Mc Donalds in madsion! the service is horrible. they constantly mess up orders, give you cold old fries, ect. dont recomend
WTF. They would even let me substitute a topping!

Daun. The guy bartenders are all really nice while the girls are snotty Bs. They are only interested in showing off cleavage for tips. Only go there if you are a guy and want to see a whole bunch of other guys at the bar because all of the lady customers will leave--no kidding.

Great Specials and Best Burgers Around. Monkey Shines has homemade lunch specials Monday through Friday. Every Thursday they have pork chops with mashed potatoes and vegetable. It also comes with their wonderful homemade bread. There are other lunch specials through out the week and soup and sandwiches. All of which are tasty and very quick. The burgers are honestly the best around. The meat is fresh, the buns are toasted and if you order it medium rare it is so juicy and flavorful. If you like ...

It was certainly nice to pay such a low price, but you really are getting the quality you're paying for. I had curds and a taco salad, both ok which were just okay. My friend and I were eating at about 830 on a Friday night, and a guy at least 20 years my senior and wayyyy past the point of drunken no return would NOT leave us alone. I get that it's successful as a bar, but it didn't help my experience there that someone who clearly should not have even been given any more booze was so in-your-f...

Low Prices, Even Lower Quality. I made a promise to myself that I'd never settle for second best, whether it be food or women. Today I broke that promise by eating at Monkeyshines. After reading a positive review on the burgers and also the cleavage at the restaurant, my friend and I were excited to try their mushroom swiss burger. When we arrived, they were completely out of mushrooms, and cleavage was no where to be seen. Talk about a let down. Our burger buns were soggy, while still managing ...

When I handed the waitress my ID, she not only examined it for a good 5 minutes, but also took her sweet, sweet time coming back. Would you like a second, third, fourth or fifth form little miss thing? By the time she came back I was ready to leave. This place SUCKS!!! Drive further down the street and go to Quiveys Grove. Much more hospitable.  -----08 Jan, 2012----- When I approached the bar, a girl who resembled a coke addict began talking about me to her boy thing. While my boyfriend was ...

One of the better chain restaurants. About the chain the redeeming qualities are fresh ingredients and good quality delivered in a fast food fashion. It fills a nice gap between the fried or burger kind of fast food and a sit down restaurant.  Staff at this location are very friendly, accomodate custom requests and the dining area is pleasant with plenty of natural light. We recommend penne rosa with parm crusted chicken which is our go-to dish here. The med flat bread sandwich is our next favor...

Food's o.k., service is TERRIBLE. My wife and I have been here more than a dozen times, sometimes only because it was convenient since we were on that side of town. Typically, the food is good. On numerous occasions my wife never got syrup for her pancakes, even asking more than once. Really? You're called Pancake Cafe and you cannot remember to bring syrup on your own, let alone after being asked 2 times? God forbid you can get a soda refill, too. 'Yeah, I'll be right back with that.' B.S. We w...
Review. Had the French toast which was fabulous. Portions are large, and I could only eat half. Took the rest home. The servers are super friendly, and I love the warm atmosphere of the fireplace.

Super good food. I have visited the panake cafe several times now and will return, I am sure, many more. Their food is terrific. I suggest the baked pankakes, special recipie meats, and home made cornbeef hash but everthing I have tried there is terrific. The only qualm I have is that they are pretty expensive. I have dropped over 65$ on breakfast for 3 in the past.
Took my family that's from out of town here for breakfast and everyone enjoyed their meals! The coffee cake was amazing.

We went here today for brunch ($21 for adults and like $12 something for kids). Very high priced for even a good buffet, which this was not. Very low quantity of food optio s and they werent replenishing anything. I am not saying this to be anything other than truthful - mcdonalds would have been twice the meal. This place has turned into a money churner and clearly ownership is letting everything go. Our bill for 8 (6 adults and 2 children) was just over $200. What an absolute joke - stay far a...

Superb Salad. I usually avoid upscale sandwitch/salad shops. They just do not appeal to me. A friend took me to this one for lunch and I opted for the Asian Chicken Salad. It was excellent. I am still not sold on the concept but will return for this salad.

Fast service   We ordered large thin crust veg pizza  After baking it did not taste gud Because of lot of toppings the middle of pizza was sawgy N the out surface crust was cooked well I thik. Because of many toopings the pizza did not taste gud

Love it. I love the food and the service. Generous portions of fresh food. Their pastas are incredible with some tasty choices I have not tried yet. The pizza has turned me from a thicker crust person to their thin crust. I have not had anything there I did not like. The staff is friendly and service is always great. Love the cheesecake to end the meal!! Sometimes it is warm tho.... but that is because it was made that day and did not cool enough! How fresh can you get?
The food was fine, but nothing special. Not as good as it sounded on the menu.
Besides employee is disgustingly gross dirty finger nails handling food, it was pretty good

It is what it is. Popeye's is the best fried chicken chain out there. That said, when comparing it to Church's or KFC, that doesn't make it fine dining, or even great fried chicken. If your grandma doesn't make it, go here. Forget all the specials. Just get a bucket of Mild or Spicy, mashed potatoes, biscuits, and enjoy watching the Badgers or the Packers on your wide-screen.

The people at this store are so unprofessional. I go there at least two times a week to eat and usually don't have a problem. I went there today and got short changed, all the food wasn't there and when I cal to let them know they hung up in my face.then had the nerve not to answer when I called back I will never go here again.
Staff was friendly and did a good job. I wouldn't come to this location at night though. A lot of questionable characters were attracted to the food.

Even Restaurant Owners Eat Here. Restaurant Week once again. And that brings me back to the good ole Stable for lunch.  The service here has never disappointed me, and if you've read my other reviews, you know I am big on service. Our food has always been great as well.  This time, we started with the potato puffs, nice and cheesy, and the Wisconsin Beer and Cheese soup, nice and beery and cheesy. Both very good. If you're Wisconsin foodie, this is a soup for you. My girlfriend barely got a ...

I have to admit I'm surprised at the number of negative reviews. Last year I moved into an apartment complex down the road from quivey's, possibly the best amenity at this complex...kthe fish fry is to die for along with almost every meal here. I never go without getting the fried chicken appetizer, and many of their dishes use parmesan potato breading, a definite plus for those with gluten allergies. (And it's worth noting that the bread basket didn't have any adverse affect on my gluten-intole...

I love this place during the holidays. Food is a bit heavy but it's comfort food. And the atmosphsere is just lovely in the old barn. We always make it a point to go there at least once while the tree is up. A Madison favorite.

It's always been good. I've had 1/4 of the items on the menu and all have been good. I'm not saying great, mind you. Opt for eating in the stable over the house as the same items on the stable menu cost more if you order them off the house menu. At least that was the case when i used to go there...

The Stable Grill has a good fish fry and burger and the best atmosphere of any restaurant in Madison. The Stone House is a bit fancy, but it's entertaining to eat in an old house. The food is more expensive, but the duck was amazing. Also, I love the local Wisconsin food theme at both restaurants.

Disappointed. We occasionally visit the Rolling Pin for lunch and bakery items. In the past the products have been good but as of lately the quality seems to be lessening. We had a yellow cake cupcake with strawberry whipped frosting. The yellow cake was very dry and almost seemed like it had been sitting on the shelf for too long. We also had their white chicken chili which we have had many times in the past. This time the chili was literally cold, not exaggerating, it needed to be reheated. Th...
Greasy. Nice little bakery, friendly staff. Cookies were good. Went back and got a cake and the frosting was so greasy none of us could eat it. I think I will just stick with the cookies.
The cakes look amazing! Rolling Pin specializes in cakes/desserts, but they have a small dining area and serve food as well. The cookie that I tried was unique and delicious.

YUM!. Carrot cake to die for! Great place for lunch or Sat. breakfast. Delicious soups & sandwiches. Biscuits & gravy on Sat. is a plateful of pure bliss. Staff is extremely friendly. John in the kitchen remembers customers' names & comes out to chat if he gets a chance.
The asm is awesome!

This one has a drive through which can be good when picking up coffee for road trip. Seating inside is alright and not much crowded in winters to be able to sit down and enjoy a boardgame. Coffee is usual starbucks fare.

typical subway location. However getting here is sometimes a bit tedious the way the roads access is planned in this area. good for a gas refill with station nearby and if you happen to be at home depot around lunch time.

Great place for a Romantic Evening, Buissness Meeting or Family Dinner.. The Tuscany Grill has gone a long way in just the last 6 Months. Right when you walk in the door the place looks nice with new carpet and table cloths, Perfectly lit with an amazing View and amazing Bar/Lounge. There’s even a Piano Player on the Weekend to make it extra special. The Service Is always pretty good but they have a few Rock stars that go the extra mile to make your night enjoyable. Now to the food because tha...

Half priced apps. We just visited for the half-priced apps during happy hour. The lounge was hard to find, very few signs, etc. Service was a tad slow, but friendly servers. A few of the appetizers were different than listed on the menu (the stuffed artichoke hearts are covered in tomato sauce; the menu doesn't list that.) although they still tasted pretty good. We were dissapointed in the shrimp brushetta; the shrimp were overcooked and rubbery, and the crostinis were a tad soggy. On the other ...

Overall 2 stars or of 5. F.... Overall 2 stars or of 5.  Foods was either cold or not what was described in the menu.  The mojito martinis were excellent! Too bad the food did not follow suit. My wife had the Mahi Mahi and I had the Salmon.

Pleasantly Surprised. After reading mostly bad reviews of this place, I was wary about giving it a try. My friend had a gift certificate she'd wanted to use though, so we gave it a shot. We walked through the doors to find a hallway and a sign indicating that the restaurant was upstairs. We went up to the next floor and saw an unmarked door. We opened it to see the restaurant. Why no sign on the door? Anyway, the place was pretty dead at 7:30. There were maybe four other tables eating. We sat at...

Rehersal Dinner. We booked the restaurant for our Rehearsal dinner over a year in advance. 3 Restaurant Managers and several meetings later, we not only arrived with our party of 25 or so to see that the space where our party was supposed to be seated was already occupied by other customers. The servers didn't know what was going on, and came up to me to ask about the who was paying for what. The food was excellent, but we were quite disappointed in the overall experience. The salads were incons...
Love it here! Family Owned!. I have been here numerous times and absolutely love it! It is cheap, great food, and great service. It is family owned and I recommend it for anyone!

A Great Little Place!. This little place does just a few things (soup, salads, confections and coffee) but does them really, really well. They serve the kind of scrumptious soups and bakery items that you will crave at 3AM. The gals behind the counter always greet you with a genuine smile and go above and beyond to make you feel welcome, as you devour your plate, mug or bowl of deliciousness, always wishing there was just one more bite.

Beautiful, clean coffee shop. Run by Peggy and a crew of lovely, gracious ladies. Features indoor/outdoor seating, landscaped grounds, immaculate restrooms, a meeting room and free wifi. Coffee, pastries, breakfast and lunch sandwiches-- all terrific. A must-visit in Fort Atkinson.

Beauty and the Bean Coffee Shop. Very nice atmosphere and people! I came to Beauty and the Bean from out of town for business and always try to keep meetings in a very professional environment. The service and product were excellent. Cleanliness of the bathrooms top notch. Volume level very good for conversation all in a relaxed atmosphere. I am going back again today! It will be worth the 2 1/2 hour drive. Thanks Beauty and the Bean staff for helping me feel at home. - Deb W from Cedar Grove, W...

Stop for coffee. I love this place. It's a cute little shop with great atmosphere and even better coffee and food. They use Alterra coffee and Ghiradelli chocolate and it's all amazing. They have great home made sandwiches and soup that are the owners own recipies. Everyone should have a nice coffee shop like this in their town and I'm glad that mine has this one.

Ill be back. This place is a DIVE bar, but I love food. Customer service is kind of poor, but beer comes fast and so does the tasty food. So I give the Belmont a thumb up. You can seat me in a shack with a waiter that doesn't speak English. All I ask is that it comes fast and it tastes good.

On the Horizon. I've not been to Bienfang's Bar or even Wisconsin, but I DID buy an awesome, vintage plastic jigger years ago and finally looked up the name printed on it and I see that "Jim Bienfang's Bar" is alive and well. I've posted a picture of it (the jigger) and I wish the family & establishment well. Whenever I DO get to Fort Atkinson, you know where to find me. Cheers, Bruce
Best drink specials in town and Always bring my family when they r in town
Great bar. Always fun, Kathy the manager is awesome as all their bartenders are. it's a real bar, not a yuppie bar. lots of laughs and good times.

Hole inside the hole in the wall. I don't know what kind of person would take there family to this place, but its ok to go with your buddies and drink cheap. I don't think I would take a date here unless I liked being single.

Fun neighborhood tavern. Blackhawk Tavern seems to be the "Cheers" bar of Fort Atkinson. Friendly and slightly worn-in feel. We shared a prime rib sandwich on asiago bread. Great Sunday lunch item, although the melted cheddar was a little too much. Spring the extra dollars for the house-made chips. What keeps us from going back often is the fact that Fort Atkinson isn't smoke-free yet.

Good Food!. Must have the homemade chips with Ranch Dressing. The chips come out fresh and hot. Also, the tenderloin burger is awesome! One of the best burgers around. Good service, good drinks. My only complaint would be that they could have more than one high chair.

Good Place to Drink.... I come here quite often for drinks and to watch ESPN or whatever game is on. The prices are fair as are the barkeeps. I just ate here for the first time. I had just a simple cheeseburger. I have to say it really wasnt very good at all. The topping and bun were actually great, but the burger itself did not seem fresh. The seasoning was quite bland and just a bad texture. Ive had the wings and some of the apps and they are ok, but nothing special. Just a bunch of frozen stu...
Good stuff nice appeal  -----14 Feb, 2013----- Great place to stop for beers and the food is excellent. Tenderloin burger is the bomb. Good staff also, no complaints at all.

Local food, local feel. Simple but good from-scratch cooking using locally sourced ingredients. Grounded small business owners who know the meaning of hospitality. We had a personal pan pizza and the "bleugrass" burger with two cups of tortellini soup, a cherry coke and beer. All were excellent. Staff is friendly, and they know many of their guests (who are also very friendly in return) by name.

Under new ownership. Capputan has always been a great place to go in my book but now that it is under new ownership I can see things already getting better. Of course there is the transition period where it may take a little longer to get your drinks and check in for tanning but if you are patient they seem to go above and beyond to help you. The ladies behind the counter are very friendly and the drinks are great. I reccomend the sandman! YUMMY! Hopefully with the new owners things will keep on...

Welcome new owners!. Capputan has been my only choice for coffee, tan's, etc. for several years now. On March 1st, Capputan's ownership changed, best of luck in retirement Deb, and welcome to the new owners Katie and Don! It has been almost a month since the change, and I have been plesantly impressed with the new owners. My daily latte's are excellant, and the service is outstanding! I personally spoke with owner Katie, and she told me about what improvements she has done and will continue to d...

Yuck!. This place really sucks...I don't know what happened from March to January..but thought I would stop in...The place was dusty and dirty..There has got to be better places than that around this area!  Too Expensive to even bother with!
Yuck, Yuck Yuck. The blind leading the blind at this place. I think I will go someplace else. Service was very slow, they didn't have the treats they normally have there...Coffee was tooo strong...
Yummy Lattes. Wow, they sure are busy here. The new owners seem to be getting things in shape and the Lattes are yummy! Can't wait to see what is next!
Cheap. Food is always the same. The buffet NEVER changes. Get there early or there will be slim pickins but just ask and they will refil whatever is empty. I will return.
Food is old usually and the menu never ever ever changes. Works when your hungry and in a hurry.

Used to be so good a few years back but we refuse to eat there now. It's expensive and the food Is mediocre at best. Also it seems the food often sits out too long and is dried out and generally unappetizing
I love this place because the service is great and the food is so good. I recommend it for people who want a cheap but satisfying meal!
Classic American chineese. Excellent and what you would expect. Great steamed dumplings. Will return!

Customer is always wrong. I ordered the pork fried rice there maybe 30 times always the same. The lady at the front counter knew me pretty well after having stopped there almost once a week for over a year. One night I get home and it was full of onions (which I am not a big onion fan) I called over to ask if I could come and switch it for one without. She very rudely told me I was wrong and that his how I ordered it. She would not exchange me for one without. I have not been back since and will...
Fresh and fast! Very clean. Nice family operation. Highly recommend!

Great Chinese Food!. I love this place. They give you a great portion for a very reasonable price. The lady is also very friendly. The food is very tasty and it's a nice place to stop when you need comfort food, in my opinion. I'm so glad Fort has a place like this.

Huge food!. They have delicious food! I've gotten the chicken strips that are the biggest I've ever gotten. their club sandwich was enough to feed me for 3 days after i ordered it! best bar food ever! if you are in fort you HAVE to come here!!! I'll be making an appearance here this weekend when i come for a visit and can't wait to have those huge juicy chicken strips! and when i say huge i mean each strip is like the equivalent of two to three normal chicken strips!

Not for everyone. We went here on the recommendation of several locals that it was a fun hang-out. We're a little newer to town, so maybe our definition of "fun" is different from everyone else's. There is no beer on tap, and our food came out cold. Our server had a great disappearing act though, so if you are looking for a magician, this might be the place for you. I think we were misplaced since we're not part of the biking crowd.

Service with an Attitude. As regulars to FatBoyz we may be biased but the food is always great. Our only concern is Deb, one of the waitresses. We know the owners and have voiced our concerns but she remains. When she works, we eat elsewhere then go there for a drink.

Extremely Disappointed. I really can't help but to think that the other reviews listed here are somehow associated with the Dinner Theatre itself. Our family of 4 attended the Fireside Christmas production in Fort Atkinson, Wisconsin. ALL of us were struggling the entire time not to fall asleep. It was incredibly boring. We will definitely not be going back. Certainly not worth the money. Hands down the worst production that any of us had ever attended. It was painful to sit through. We were ver...
Fabulous food. Always great meal every time we visit. Service top notch

Great Food, Great Show, Great Value. We are from Eastern Iowa and have been to The Fireside 5 or 6 times in the past 8 years or so. We have NEVER gone away disappointed with ANY part of our experience. We have been to 3 other dinner theaters that use the traditional method of "dinner and show" from the dining tables. We much prefer Fireside's method of a separate dining area allowing for traditional theater seating in the auditorium. With the stage area in the center, surrounded by the seating a...

Wonderful!. My husband and I visited The Fireside this past Saturday evening for dinner and a show. We had never been there other than for the fish fry so we thought we'd check out the menu. I had the grilled shrimp with yukon gold potatoes, and a tomato cream sauce for the shrimp. It was delicious! The shrimp was not overcooked, which many places make that mistake. My husband had the hawaiian ribeye, and was done perfectly to his liking! We also both enjoyed the cream of watercress soup, which ...

Went tonight (Thursday Jan. 26, 2017).  Buffet was great.  Never a disappointment!!!  Momma Mia was FANTASTIC!!  People were dancing in their seats.  Grab your tickets and go!!!!  Have not been diappointed in any shows we've seen.  We go to the Thursday "buffet" shows because we enjoy that dinner the best.  Was disappointed in weekend dinners.  Food bland and not much.  Sure can't say that about Thursday nights'!!!  Something for everyone

Good food fast. I am a regular for breakfasts. FAFR has very good "diner food". Their biscuits and gravy are very good. They also have very good omelets and skillets. The service is always excellent and the prices are reasonable. We try to get here at least two or three times a month. It's nothing fancy, just good food, good service, and reasonable prices.

Our entire family of 25 came here for a farewell brunch after being told we could not be seated together at another family restaurant. We were extremely impressed with how the staff handled such a large group on short notice. They were very friendly, never got impatient, all the orders were correct, coffee cups were never empty, and the food was delicious!

Can't wait for The Freeze to open every spring. Excellent ice cream and a lot cheaper than Culver's. The only downside is that the drive-thru tends to get backed-up out to Mad Ave. My favorite is the Fresh Strawberry Freeze.
Epic. What can you say about frosties. It great. its a 1/4 of the price of anywhere else and its good. youll find a line at 10 am on wed. here for a reason.
Over priced for what you get... Small portions. Soft serve isn't that expensive... So why do they keep uppingthe prices???
You know it's spring time when the freeze is open. Super cheap and awsome. Local staple of fort residents in summertime. Twinkle coat cones are a favorite.

Any excuse to get one. Every time we get a chance to visit Fort Atkinson, we enjoy our stay even more when there's a birthday, anniversary, etc. involved because then we can get a cake from Jerry! His cakes have never disappointed. We even asked him to do our wedding cake and I was blown away by what he created. You can tell he truly loves what he does. We just got back recently and ordered two cakes for our children's birthdays. We thought for sure we would be bringing some home. Apparently, hi...
Great Cake. Jerry is really just a wonderful person and really loves what he does. If you want to impress people with a great cake at a good price call jerry and see what he can do for you.

Jerry is a truly caring individual who will bring a smile to your face each time you see him. Always laughing and smiling, his effervescent personality really shows in his cakes and other desserts. If you are looking for something for any occasion, he is your man. I've seen him do weddings, scouting events, graduation parties, just for fun, birthdays and everything inbetween! You won't be let down by his excellent service and small town bakery!
YUM. Jerry is a fantastic cake maker. Hes on time, goes above and beyond what you ask for and his cakes are soooo yummy! Never had a bad cake. Reccomend him to everyone.
Fast food. What can I say, its a Jimmy John's. Nothing special here, but its fast and everything is fresh. I could make the same sandwiches at home.
Super fast and clean
Great fried chicken!1

Good Stuff. This isnt a place you can just go to, but if you see one of the wagons out you must try the mint chocolate with the salty peanuts. You will like it. I know that Ken & Betty's used to carry this ice cream, but I guess not anymore.

This is by far the worst McDonald's I have ever been to!! The service is horrible! If you only order a drink they get it wrong. And employees are extremely rude! If I'm in the mood for McDonalds I will drive to jefferson!
3 piece battered cod. The best cod in a good half mile radius

Run down, road house looking place I'm the middle of nowhere by the lake. However the fish and chips where brilliant and the people are rediciously friendly highly recommended place. 3 piece cod and chips are the best I've had in ages and I'm brittish !

Skip it. The smoke is gone, but the food is still bad. If you go, just order a burger - the steaks and prime rib are just awful and overpriced. My 11 year old dining companion ordered the cheese curds and corn dogs. She said about half of the cheese curds were without cheese and the ones that had cheese were "super hard and stale." On the corn dogs she said "they didn't have enough dog." My other companion and I ordered the rib eye steaks as we had a gift certificate from restaurants.com and had...

Good fish fry. The North Shore Inn has very reasonably priced and good food and drink. The service is always friendly. Nothing fancy here - just a down home supper club. I imagine some of the complaints about the awful cigarette smoke will be gone now. A good place to meet folks for very casual dining at inexpensive prices.
It's pizzA hut. No frills. Clean. Good salad bar and lunch buffet.

Good pie. I give villa a 7 out of 10. id give an 8, but ive never been a huge fan of thier peperoni. They have a good BBQ selection. the owner is very passionate about his BBQ and it is quite good. This is not the typical BBQ though, this is the real deal BBQ. The ribs are beef and they are big (its a cow). So don't expect babybacks and cornbread. This is texas style BBQ. Give it try and youll be a fan like me.

New Owners. Pizza Villa has been under new (actually old) ownership since March of 2013. The restaurant was bought back by the original owners, been cleaned up and is the good ole Villa we all grew up with in the 70's - 90's! Stop in for a pizza and say hi to ma & pa!

The only good thing I can say is their breakfast is ok and you get a decent amount of food for the price. However, the quality of the lunch and dinner foods is bland at best (which is why it is filled with elderly customers most of the time). The soups are frozen bagged soup, not homemade. One gets the impression they use the cheapest available foods to give the customer more for the money. Only eat here if you can't get to other parts of Fort Atkinson and the vastly better local eateries.

Truly Subpar. My family and I went here in late October... we rarely go out, and this was a huge waste of time and money. The food quality over all was not the greatest, but my dish (I believe it was the ravioli) was totally disgusting. You could tell it's something they buy and just heat up in a pan, dump it on your plate with nasty sauce, and change you an arm and a leg for it. Actually, that's unfair, because I happen to love Sam's Club's premade ravioli, and this stuff didn't even compare to...

A bit disappointed, but will try the pizza next time.. My wife and I went here shortly after we moved to the area. Both of us are from the Milwaukee/Chicago corridor area so perhaps our expectations were high, but we both thought the food was a bit bland. Execution, service was good, but the flavor was lacking. I had Canneloni, my wife had Artichoke and Spinach ravioli. My son had a Calzone which was good, and our daughter had plain ravioli.

Excellent pasta, pizza & calzones. This is my favorite pizza in Fort-but delivery generally takes 45 min. The restaurant side is a typical family restaurant & the bar side is good for stopping by after work even if you have a fairly large group. The stuffed crust pizza is a monster!!! -one slice and u will be full. :)
Great Pizza and the best Sports Bar in town. Large dinning and bar area that can easily accommodate almost any party size.

I dont get it. I know by growing up in this area that people around here have no concept of good cuisine. Salamone's is thought of as one of the best restaurants in the are and its always packed for weekend dinner. I personally think the food quality is not very good and everything here is quite bland. I hate to slam a local place, but they do have good service, location and the building itself is very nice. They just need to get a new chef to come in and work on the menu. I think they could pul...

We'll be back - NOT 11/16/10. We did not expect to find this place so busy on a beautiful Sunday night at 5:30. The back bar area was very crowded, while the dining room filled up quickly around 6:00. The environment is very nice, service friendly and the pizza excellent. Both of my companions said it was one of the best pizza's they've had recently and will come back. There is an in house roasted prime rib special on Saturday nights so I will be back to try it! Skip the calamari appetizer as it...

Disturbia. I just really don't understand small towns even though I grew up around here. A place like this would never survive in a bigger city. It is like Jefferson county is filled with people that have gutter palates. They think places like this are good. All of the food is bland (or under seasoned) and either over/undercooked. Nothing seems to be of high quality and the service can be misleading. I went here once and ordered the greek cheese and the waiter thought he was smart not telling me...

Great All Around!. My family and I have gone here for years and have never been disappointed :) LOVE their Greek food! And their BBQ Ribs are soooo tender they fall right off the bone! I was really shocked to see some of the other comments because we enjoy Sammy's so much every time we go(even the picky ones!). And as for "kitchen Nightmares", I've seen customers go into the kitchen to thank Sammy for a great meal and it's always been clean and organized. I would (and do!) recommend Sammy's Plac...

Never again. My husband and I went here for dinner. I don't know who voted this place "Best of" Fort Atkinson, but it's more like "worst of." It's mostly bar food and even that isn't good. We ordered the combo platter which consisted of pale colored onion rings, motz sticks, jalapeno poppers, ranch dressing that tasted like tartar sauce and watered down marinara. I had a steak which was okay, very undercooked and the oven brown potatoes were okay. My husband ordered prime rib, which was overcook...

Worst place in fort atkinson. This place sucks. the food was horrible i ordered the italian beef with au jus. The au jus was cold same as the meat . the meat tasted old and had a nasty smell to it i told the waitress and she said she would take if off the bill i had one bite and that was it. She went to the "so called chef they have" and he said not to take it off the bill because he said it was fine. This was my first and my last time to this dump. I would never recommend this place to anyone.

Pay no heed to the wanna be Gordon Ramsays on here. Sammy delivers great meals, everytime. Large portions at fair prices and a wide selection of dishes on the menu so that everyone in your group can find something they love. The ambiance is typical Wisconsin supper club. See if you can find the secret star on the ceiling! Service is impeccable, you feel like you are dining with old friends. Helen, Taylor, and Haley do a great job of making sure you don't leave hungry. Do yourself a favor and che...

A hidden gem in downtown Fort! This narrow 50s-style short-order diner cozily seats 16 around Scottie and his grill. Half the charm is watching him cook and prepare the meals. The menu consists of hearty breakfast foods and a limited lunch menu of burgers and hot sandwhiches. Prices range from $3-7. The food is fresh, mostly local ingredients and you get a lot for your money. If you go for breakfast expect to get into a conversation with the regulars and the staff. Very friendly place with a gre...

Give me more Scottie's Eat More(s). I stopped in yesterday while on a road trip, intrigued by the sign and apparent hole-in-the-wall size which is my kind of café. It did not disappoint. The food, atmosphere, cliental and crew were great. They only have counter seating (for about 12 I think), which is enough and holds down the noise level always existent in larger establishments). The quality and amount of food for the price is a real deal, and they made me feel like a home-town regular rather ...

Small town spectacular. This place is small, but very cozy. This is something from another world. If your under 40 years youve probably never been to a place like this. There are imitations like jonny rockets, but this is the real deal. scottie make everything to order form all fresh ingredients not more than 10 feet from you. Jackie will be your server (unless shes made her trip to Florida) and shes just wonderful. If you can eat more than $7 worth of food you are an impressive eater. all thye ...
This place is amazing. The staff is hilarious and insightful. Whenever I get a chance to go here I always enjoy my meal.
Well went there around 7am to get breakfast and on the door ot says open at 5am. Very upsetting.

Breakfast Biscuits and Gravy. Have eaten here a few times ..most food is great ...however do not order biscuits. and gravy think they need to check for better homemade recipe elsewhere if they wish to have it on menu..Deegs in Watertown breakfast is great in my opinion best breakfast menu skillet breakfasts best.was disappointed at biscuits and gravy at Soups On in Fort Atkinson,Wi..
Greasy spoon. Old and not terribly clean. Foods ok.

Great Soup!!. My husband and I have lived in the area for 4 years and never stopped at Soup's on. My parents come up from Milwaukee about once a month and stopped there for lunch a few times and raved about the food. Finally one day my husband and I stopped there. Now we can't get enough of it. I crave the soup!! We would drive to Janesville or Watertown and go to the restaurants over there. The food is great, they give you lots of it and it is cheap! My favorite soups are the chicken or turkey ...
Meh. This is pathetically the best breakfast in Fort. I have to give it thumbs up just for that fact.
The most amazing resteraunt ever! Breakfas lunch or Friday fish u name it theyll make it and very nice service! Best soup,fish,lunch and bar around!
Best Steak in Rock County

Comfort food. I used to go as here a kid and have always thought this was an alright place. One way to tell if a place is good if you find a supper club in the middle of nowhere and its packed the the hilt every thursday friday and saturday. need i say more?

Supper club fare. The Stagecoach has wonderful supper club fare. Their steaks are quite good and reasonably priced. The prime rib is good, not excellent. The fish fry is popular and tasty. Cocktails are well made and reasonable. The place has been renovated and looks great. You will not be disappointed if you stop here.

The best supper club in the area. The steaks are all good, the filet mignon with Two lobstertails is a great bargain. Wait staff is always friendly and take direction on the pace you want to set. I recommend you eat later in the evening and have cocktails either at the bar or outside, weather permitting.
This place is one of my top three for prime rib. Excellent service. The only down side is that they are normally busy and you need to come early to get a table.
